alert.note: Alert for Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued February 03 at 2:34PM MST until February 04 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Tucson Metro Area. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
